Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 63rd/Cottage.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at 63rd/Cottage.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
